editorialNotes.standard: This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivals’ property, and rake in profits.
Be our guest and bring iconic Disney and Pixar scenes to life in this charming Tri Peaks solitaire game.

ios.subtitle: Play For Fun, Win Real Money

editorialNotes.short: Classic puzzles for all difficulty levels and daily challenges with trophies.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Whether playing in the same room or remotely, passions can run wild while trying to get everyone to agree in Wavelength. The more people playing, the better, as you’ll find little consensus on how, say, roller coasters rank on a scale from thrilling to terrifying. You might even learn something new about your friends. We all agree on one thing, though: It’s one of the best party games we’ve played.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: Daily Mahjong Match

editorialNotes.standard: A minimalist puzzler through and through, TwoDots—the single-player sequel to Dots—delivers accessible and satisfying challenges by the bucketful. While its style and sound mirror the unvarnished nature of its puzzles, its seemingly simple exterior hides a compelling depth that’ll keep you coming back for more.
editorialNotes.short: Make a square, how hard is that? Spoiler alert, it is.
Unwind with colouring in by numbers to create fun pixel art and 3D images.
